lead_paragraph: BANKER--Meredith E.,Los Angeles actress, writer, yoga enthusiast and instructor, after suffering a tragic accident on March 20, 2016. Beloved daughter of Amy Cohen Banker and Stephen M. Banker, cherished stepdaughter of Susan Shankman Banker and sister to Benjamin and the late Allison. Meredith was a graduate of the Hewitt School, Wheaton College, and The Stella Adler Studio of Acting-NYU Tisch School of the Arts. Service Friday, March 25, 11:45am at "The Riverside," 76 St. at Amsterdam Ave. Donations may be made to The Stella Adler Studio, 31 W. 27 St., 3D Floor, NY, NY 10001, attn. Nina Capelli, www.StellaAdler.com 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  BANKER, MEREDITH E.
